alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Hardin (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:54PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hardin, southern Gallatin and southwestern Union Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 554 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Rosiclare, or 12 miles southeast of Harrisburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shawneetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southern Illinois...and western and northwestern Kentucky.
